Query.command: INSERT INTO Clienti (nume, prenume, email) VALUES (@nume, @prenume, @email)
UPDATE Clienti SET nume = @nume, prenume = @prenume, email = @email WHERE id = @id
INSERT INTO Comenzi (idClient, dataComanda, detaliiComanda) VALUES (@idClient, @dataComanda, @detaliiComanda)
UPDATE Comenzi SET idClient = @idClient, dataComanda = @dataComanda, detaliiComanda = @detaliiComanda WHERE id = @id
INSERT INTO Tara (denumire, populatie, capitala) VALUES (@denumire, @populatie, @capitala)
UPDATE Tara SET populatie = @populatie, capitala = @capitala WHERE id = @id
INSERT INTO Companie (nume, industrie, capital, idTara) VALUES (@nume, @industrie, @capital, @idTara)
UPDATE Companie SET nume = @nume, industrie = @industrie, capital = @capital, idTara = @idTara WHERE id = @id
